author: Agyys D
content:
So glad that we did try this hidden gem. So much different to the taste of Indian food in NL (where we come from). So cheap. Good portion. Quick.
I can eat there every day I guess.
You can choose meals of choice (rice with one meat and two vegetables or rice with 3 meats dishes, etc). The place is small, but we didn't face problems eating lunch there with 7 of us.
The meals are at least medium spicy. So not suitable for young children.
Recommended!
